# Load Data

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(lubridate)
library(measurements)
library(sp)
library(readr)
library(sf)
library("rnaturalearth")
library("rnaturalearthdata")
library(cmocean)

```

# Machine Readible QAQC

```{r}

sample_Data <- read.csv(file = here("MachineReadable_CruiseSampleMetadata_DY22-09.csv"), header=T,fileEncoding="UTF-8")

sample_Data %>% 
  mutate(., Combined_date = str_c(Collection_Date_UTC, " ",Collection_Time_UTC),
            Combined_date_local = str_c(Collection_Date_local, " ",Collection_Time_local))%>% 
  mutate(.,  Date_UTC = as.POSIXct(Combined_date, format="%m/%d/%Y %H:%M", tz="UTC"),
                           Date_UTC = if_else(is.na(Date_UTC), as.POSIXct(Collection_Date_local, format="%m/%d/%Y", tz="UTC"), Date_UTC ), 
         Date_local_check = as.POSIXct(Combined_date_local, format="%m/%d/%y %H:%M", tz="US/Alaska"),
         Date_local_check = if_else(is.na(Date_local_check), as.POSIXct(Combined_date_local, format="%m/%d/%Y", tz="UTC"), Date_local_check ), 
         Date_local= format(Date_UTC,tz="US/Alaska")) %>% 
  mutate(., Lat_fix =str_remove(Lat, "' N")) %>% 
    mutate(., Lat_fix =str_replace(Lat_fix, "˚","")) %>% 
  mutate(., Lat_dec = measurements::conv_unit(Lat_fix,'deg_dec_min','dec_deg')) %>% 
  mutate(., Lat_dec=as.numeric(Lat_dec)) %>% 
  mutate(., Lon_fix =str_remove(Lon, "' W")) %>% 
    mutate(., Lon_fix =str_replace(Lon_fix, "˚","")) %>%
    mutate(., Lon_dec = measurements::conv_unit(Lon_fix,'deg_dec_min','dec_deg')) %>% 
  mutate(., Lon_dec=as.numeric(Lon_dec)) %>% 
  mutate(., , Lon_dec = Lon_dec*-1) %>% 
  mutate(., Cast=as.character(Cast_No.),
         Bottle=as.character(Rosette_position))  -> QAQCMRE_CruiseSampleMetadata_DY22_09


c("Sample_Name","Biological_Replicate","Technical_Replicate","Negative_control",    "Cruise_ID_short",     "Cruise_ID_long",     "Collection_Date_UTC", "Collection_Date_local","Collection_Time_UTC","Collection_Time_local"                   ,"Field_Sample_Name",   "Cast_No.",  "Rosette_position",    "Field_collection_method"       ,"Preservation",       "Area.within.region",  "Station",    "Depth_m",   
"Lat",        "Lon",        "Sample_volume_ml",   
"Personnel_responsible_for_Collecting_Sample", "Field_Notes","Combined_date",      "Combined_date_local", "Date_UTC",   "Date_local_check",   
"Date_local", "Lat_fix",    "Lat_dec",   
"Lon_fix",    "Lon_dec",    "Cast",      
"Bottle"   ) -> skq1_colnames

colnames(QAQCMRE_CruiseSampleMetadata_DY22_09)
setdiff(skq1_colnames,colnames(QAQCMRE_CruiseSampleMetadata_DY22_09) )
setdiff(colnames(QAQCMRE_CruiseSampleMetadata_DY22_09),skq1_colnames )

QAQCMRE_CruiseSampleMetadata_DY22_09 <- QAQCMRE_CruiseSampleMetadata_DY22_09[, skq1_colnames]

readr::write_excel_csv(QAQCMRE_CruiseSampleMetadata_DY22_09, file="QAQCMRE_CruiseSampleMetadata_DY22_09.csv")

```


```{r}

min_lat <- min(QAQCMRE_CruiseSampleMetadata_DY22_09$Lat_dec, na.rm = T)
max_lat <- max(QAQCMRE_CruiseSampleMetadata_DY22_09$Lat_dec, na.rm = T)

min_lon <- min(QAQCMRE_CruiseSampleMetadata_DY22_09$Lon_dec, na.rm = T)
max_lon <- max(QAQCMRE_CruiseSampleMetadata_DY22_09$Lon_dec, na.rm = T)

world <- ne_countries(scale = "medium", returnclass = "sf")
QAQCMRE_CruiseSampleMetadata_DY22_09$Date_UTC %>% as.Date() -> dates


ggplot(data = world) +
    geom_sf() +
    geom_point(data = QAQCMRE_CruiseSampleMetadata_DY22_09, aes(x = Lon_dec, y = Lat_dec, colour=as.Date(Date_UTC)), size=2) +
    coord_sf(xlim = c(min_lon-1, max_lon+1), ylim = c(min_lat-1, max_lat+1), expand = FALSE) +theme_bw() +xlab("Longitude") +ylab("Latitude") +
  geom_text(data = QAQCMRE_CruiseSampleMetadata_DY22_09, aes(x = Lon_dec, y = Lat_dec, label=Station),size = 2, colour="black") + scale_color_cmocean(labels=dates, breaks=dates, name ="tempo", start = 0.1, end=0.5) +labs(colour="Date")


```

# Read Bottle Data


```{r}

bottle_Data <- read.csv(file = here("CTD_raw_BottleFile_DY22-09.csv"), header=T)

bottle_Data %>% 
  mutate(., holder1 = str_remove(profile_id,"DY2209c"),
         Cast = str_remove(holder1,"_btl")) %>% 
           mutate(., Cast = as.numeric(Cast)) %>% 
   rename_with(.fn = ~ paste0("btl_", .x))-> bottle_Data

bottle_Data$Cast <- as.character(bottle_Data$btl_Cast)
bottle_Data$bottle <- as.character(bottle_Data$btl_bottle)
```

# Read CTD Downcast Data

```{r}

ctd_Data <- read.csv(file =here("CTD_dy2209_final_merged_62b5_4b35_a001.csv"), header=T)


ctd_Data %>% 
  dplyr::group_by(profile_id,pressure)  %>% 
  filter(n()>1) -> duplicate_bottles


duplicate_bottles %>% 
     filter(., `SI..uM.l.` !="NaN") -> bottles_avg

ctd_Data %>% 
   filter(., !profile_id %in% bottles_avg$profile_id) %>% 
  bind_rows(bottles_avg) %>% 
  mutate(., holder1 = str_remove(profile_id,"dy2209c"),
          Cast = as.numeric(holder1)) %>% 
   rename_with(.fn = ~ paste0("ctd_", .x)) -> ctd_Data


ctd_Data$Cast <- as.character(ctd_Data$ctd_Cast)
ctd_Data$pressure <- as.numeric(ctd_Data$ctd_pressure)


```

# Merge Sample, Bottle, and CTD Data

```{r}
 QAQCMRE_CruiseSampleMetadata_DY22_09 %>% 
    mutate(pressure= round(Depth_m,0)) %>% 
    left_join(ctd_Data, by = c("Cast" = "Cast", "pressure" = "pressure")) %>% 
  left_join(bottle_Data, by = c("Cast" = "Cast", "Bottle" = "bottle")) %>%   mutate(., Date_UTC_btl = as.POSIXct(`btl_time..UTC.`, format="%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ", tz="UTC") )-> EcoFOCI_Fall_2022_sample_data


#colnames(ctd_Data)[2:13] -> cols_2_keep
library(rlang)

EcoFOCI_Fall_2022_sample_data %>% 
  select(Sample_Name, 
         Biological_Replicate,
         Technical_Replicate,
         Negative_control, 
         Cruise_ID_short, 
         Cruise_ID_long,
         Cast_No.,
         Rosette_position,
         Field_collection_method,
         Preservation,
         Station,
                  Depth_m_notes=Depth_m,
         Sample_volume_ml,
         Personnel_responsible_for_Collecting_Sample,
         Field_Notes,
         Date_UTC_notes=Date_UTC,
         Lat_notes = Lat_dec,
         Lon_notes=Lon_dec,
          Date_UTC_btl,
         #!!!syms(cols_2_keep),
            starts_with("ctd"),
        starts_with("btl")) -> EcoFOCI_Fall_2022_sample_data

readr::write_excel_csv(EcoFOCI_Fall_2022_sample_data, file="FinalOME_Merge_DY22-09.csv")
```
